media_sets.description: Ondemand HTTP and HLS streaming intended for iPad 1 and 2 over WiFi and 3G.  This media set will be deprecated in favour of apple-ipad-hls in time
Ondemand HTTP streaming via BT WCC CDS intended for BT Cardinal (BT Vision) bigscreen devices
Ondemand HTTPS streaming intended for Set-top boxes (STBs) using the native media player

The 'emp' media set is the default media set (ie: if none specified 'emp' is set) for the episodedetail ION feed, and the episode playlist.  It will be deprecated in favour of the 'pc' media set in time.

Ondemand RTMP streaming intended for clients accessing iPlayer on a standard PC browser.  This media set also contains all Radio services (both abstract and concrete) for all territiories, in order to correctly display availability for UK Radio Player, bo
